items.content_html: Sample project that demonstrates how to setup a multitenant application for a software-as-a-service scenario using the SAP BTP Cloud Foundry environment. Developers learn how to implement their own CAP (mtxs) based SaaS app including an SaaS API and integration with various essential SAP BTP service offerings.
items.title: SAP-samples/btp-cf-cap-multitenant-susaas: Sample project that demonstrates how to setup a multitenant application for a software-as-a-service scenario using the SAP BTP Cloud Foundry environment. Developers learn how to implement their own CAP (mtxs) based SaaS app including an SaaS API and integration with various essential SAP BTP service offerings.
